title: Yo fuck you Riot
body: I just go banned for a third time and I wasnt even flaming my team mates this time, I wasnt talking shit to anyone and yet somehow I get banned? Wtf riot unban me right now. This is bs and it needs to stop, this isnt kindergarden you fucking morons, stop banning people for cursing

replies.body:
Cursing isn't the issue, it's directing it at other players in an abusive manner. It's possible to curse without it being an issue, and also to abuse a player without cursing.

If you want to discuss your punishment here, I suggest posting your reform card(s) so we can go over what you did that was unacceptable and what you could've done better. If you want to appeal your ban to Riot you need to submit a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
I didnt do jack shit that was unacceptable. I never aimed any anger towards another player so you better fucking unban the account "Papa 9 Incher" right fucking now.
I agree.  Without logs, most won't be inclined to believe you.  Especially given the language and tone you are using in this thread.

No one cares what you think.
You're not the one deciding.
Grow up kid.
You wanna get banned... This is how you get banned.

And yet the manner in which you come onto boards and try and address the people you want to help you is most likely why you got banned in the first place. Sorry buddy, but you are showing us all exactly why the community does not need your toxicity.

>  I wasnt talking shit to anyone and yet somehow I get banned? 

The fact that you didn't post your chat logs indicates that you're lying. Screenshot us your chat logs.

the heat from his anger in the post miraculously cooked my ramen for me.

in the package no less!
